name: Find the House
description:
In this game you need to found some house in it, also there no timer, you can explore the scene and find houses. In Level 1 find the two key object to unlock the invisible wall, In level 4 you will be afraid of something... like a big object that will be following you when walk slowly, there a spotlight make easy to finding the house.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key for Movement & Mouse for Move the Cam.
